Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: DRL Forex Trading Agent

Complete implementation of a low-risk trading agent for prop firm challenges:

Features:
- PPO-based deep reinforcement learning
- Risk-first reward function (Sortino ratio + drawdown penalties)
- Safety layer with hard risk guardrails
- Risk-based position sizing with ATR stop losses
- Preprocessing pipeline (log returns + normalized indicators)
- Complete training pipeline with evaluation

Components:
- Custom Gymnasium environment (src/environment/trading_env.py)
- Feature engineering (src/environment/preprocessing.py)
- Reward calculator (src/utils/reward_calculator.py)
- Safety layer (src/agents/safety_layer.py)
- Training script (src/training/train_ppo.py)
- Data loader (src/utils/data_loader.py)

Technical Details:
- Action space: [position_direction, risk_pct]
- State space: ~25 normalized features
- Target: EURUSD/GBPUSD on 15-minute candles
- Daily loss limit: 4% | Max drawdown: 10%
EOF
